You will need a pencil or pen to complete this portion… Are you ready?
When questions are complete Thank you for your patience and for answering these previous questions. Please note that we will keep this information with your research records. As I mention before, some of your responses may be shared with our Football Player Health Study staff members and you may be contacted to participate in additional research opportunities. I have recorded your answers to the questions and these will be reviewed by a study physician to determine whether you are eligible for the study. May I put you on a brief hold while I finish that up? Enter scores and save when complete references: dynamic_model__ipa_ps_tmoca: from: this add: one_to_this creatable_if: <<: *enabled_if all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: tmoca_0 callback_required: "ok to continue" not_any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: tmoca_1 completed_questions: label: Review Details fields: references: dynamic_model__ipa_ps_comp_review: from: this add: one_to_this creatable_if: <<: *enabled_if all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: tms_1 not_any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: completed_questions #cognitive_screening_completed: # label: Cognitive Screening Completed # caption_before: # all_fields: | # Thank you for your patience and for answering these previous questions. # # Please note that we will keep this information with your research records. We will contact you to let you know if you are eligible. # # creatable_if: # <<: *enabled_if # all: # activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: # extra_log_type: tmoca_1 # not_any: # activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: # extra_log_type: cognitive_screening_completed ############################### # Informant Details - V1 ############################### informant_details: label: Informant Details caption_before: all_fields: | [For those who scored <= 19 on the T-MoCA ONLY] The next step of this screening process is to speak to a close family member who knows you well or someone who can legally make decisions for you to ask them questions about your memory. For example, we will ask them to tell us if you need reminders or help with activities such as keeping track of appointments, household chores and personal care. We will also ask them to tell us about your mood – for example, if you get anxious or irritated. This will entail a brief phone call with the individual you decide to provide contact information for. Following the phone call, we will send them an individualized link via email which will contain a 23 -question survey. This survey will not contain any identifiable information – for instance, it will not contain your name, address, or birthdate and your family member will not be asked to provide this information either. Do we have your permission to speak to someone that knows you well? references: dynamic_model__ipa_ps_informant_detail: from: master add: one_to_master creatable_if: <<: *enabled_if all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: tmoca_1 dynamic_model__ipa_ps_tmocas: tmoca_score: condition: <= value: 19 not_any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: informant_details save_trigger: on_create: create_reference: - activity_log__ipa_assignment: in: master with: extra_log_type: schedule_informant_screener notes: ADL Informant Screener required based on T-MoCA result. Schedule a call with the informant. ####################### # Schedule Callback - V1 ####################### schedule_callback: label: Schedule Callback fields: - callback_date - callback_time - notes caption_before: all_fields: | Thank you for your patience and for answering these previous questions. We will then contact you to let you know if you are eligible or not. If you are eligible, we will let you know the next steps. Do you have any questions? We will call you back to inform you of your eligibility status. What is a good day/time to call you? It may take up to 10 days for us to make a determination. submit: If you have any questions in the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you again for your time. creatable_if: <<: *enabled_if all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: tmoca_1 not_any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens: extra_log_type: schedule_callback save_trigger: on_create: create_reference: - activity_log__ipa_assignment: in: master with: extra_log_type: screening_follow_up select_who: current_user_email follow_up_when: this: callback_date: return_value follow_up_time: this: callback_time: return_value notes: Participant phone screening completed. Follow-up has been scheduled. select_record_from_player_contacts: activity_log__ipa_assignments: extra_log_type: schedule_screening select_record_from_player_contacts: return_value ############################### # Informant Details - V2 ############################### informant_details_v2: label: Informant Details caption_before: all_fields: | [For those who scored <17 on the T-MoCA ONLY] The next step of this screening process is to speak to a close family member who knows you well or someone who can legally make decisions for you to ask them questions about how you are doing with day-to-day activities. For example, we will ask them to tell us if you need help with activities such as keeping track of appointments, household chores and personal care. We will also ask them to tell us about your mood – for example, if you get anxious or irritated. This will entail a brief phone call with the individual you decide to provide contact information for. Following the phone call, we will send them an individualized link via email which will contain a 23 -question survey. This survey will not contain any identifiable information – for instance, it will not contain your name, address, or birthdate and your family member will not be asked to provide this information either. valid_associated_activity_logs.name: Medical Navigation
valid_associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
# @library ipa enabled_if

_definitions:

######################

  followup_fields: &followup_fields
    - activity_date
    - select_direction
    - select_contact
    - select_result
    - select_next_step
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time


  communication_fields: &communication_fields
    - select_activity
    - activity_date
    - select_contact
    - select_direction
    - select_result
    - select_next_step
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time

  communication_show_if: &communication_show_if
    select_result:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - schedule follow up
          - completed
    select_next_step:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    follow_up_when:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    follow_up_time:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    select_direction:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - schedule follow up
          - completed
    select_contact:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - completed

        select_direction:
          - in person

  communication_field_options: &communication_field_options
    select_result:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "Completed": completed
          "Follow up": follow up
    select_next_step:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          # "More Info Requested": more info requested
          # "No Follow Up": no follow up
          "Call Back": call back
          "Email Back": email back


    select_contact:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_record_from_player_contacts

    select_activity:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "General Communications": general communications
          "Incidental Finding": incidental finding
          "Schedule Follow Up": schedule follow up
          "Mark All Previous As Completed": completed

    select_direction:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "In Person": in person
          "By Phone": by phone


  communication_caption_before: &communication_caption_before
    select_activity: Select an action
    activity_date: Date
    select_contact: Phone or email address
    select_direction: Was the follow-up / interview performed in person or by phone?
    select_result: Is a follow up required, or is this communication complete?


_default:
  fields: *communication_fields

  show_if:
    <<: *communication_show_if

  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options

  caption_before:
    <<: *communication_caption_before

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  showable_if: *enabled_if
  creatable_if: *enabled_if
  editable_if: *enabled_if



#################################################
exit_interview:
  label: Exit Interview
#################################################

  fields: *followup_fields

  references:
    dynamic_model__ipa_exit_interview:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this



#################################################
two_wk_followup:
  label: Two Week Follow Up
#################################################

  fields: *followup_fields

  references:
    dynamic_model__ipa_two_wk_followup:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

#################################################
four_wk_followup:
  label: Four Week Follow Up
#################################################

  fields: *followup_fields

  references:
    dynamic_model__ipa_four_wk_followup:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this


#################################################
participant_communication:
  label: Participant Communication
#################################################

  references:
    dynamic_model__ipa_mednav_followup:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      prevent_disable: true

  caption_before:
    <<: *communication_caption_before
    select_direction: Was the communication received by FPHS staff or sent to the subject?


  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options
    select_direction:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "To Staff": to staff
          "To Subject": to subject



#################################################
provider_communication:
  label: Provider Communication
#################################################

  references:
    dynamic_model__ipa_mednav_provider_comm:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      prevent_disable: true


  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options
    select_activity:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "General Communications": general communications
          "Schedule Follow Up": schedule follow up
          "Mark All Previous As Completed": completed
    select_direction:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "To Staff": to staff
          "To Provider": to provider

    select_contact:
      edit_as:
        field_type: contact



  caption_before:
    select_activity: Select an action
    activity_date: Date

valid_associated_activity_logs.name: Discussions
valid_associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
# @library ipa enabled_if
# @library ipa filestore_container
# @library ipa notification_base

_definitions:

####
# App specific configurations.
# EDIT this section to meet the requirements of the app
####

  role_selection_options: &role_selection_options
    Phone Screen Interviewer: phone screen interviewer
    All Phone Screeners: all phone screeners
    Clinical Research Coordinator: clinical research coordinator
    Navigator: navigator
    Med Nav: med nav
    TMS: tms
    PI: pi
    

  # Default email - just add roles or users
  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email
    layout_template: ipa notification layout
    content_template: ipa notification message
    subject: "IPA App: Discussion Message - {{referring_record.id}}"
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: 'New Discussion Message'
      extra_text: |
        To Role: *{{referring_record.tag_select_contact_role::join_with_semicolon}}*
        
        Discussion Subject: **{{referring_record.notes}}**
        
        A new message has been sent from this discussion. Click the link below
        to access the full message in Athena.
        
      panel_tab: activity-log--ipa-assignment-discussions
      item_id: "{{referring_record.id}}"



  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: ipa sms notification
    subject: "IPA Discussion"


###############################################
# Now load discussion specific libraries
###############################################
# @library ipa notify_roles
# @library ipa discussions
###############################################


start_new_discussion:
  label: '{{notes}}'
  button_label: Start New Discussion
  <<: *setup_discussion

  field_options:
    <<: *start_discussion_field_options
    tag_select_contact_role:
      edit_as:
        alt_options: *role_selection_options

  showable_if:
    any:
      
      # Current user created the discussion
      all_creator:
        this:
          user_id:
            user: id

      # Any selected role matches an actual role the user has
      all_a_role_matches:
        this:
          tag_select_contact_role:
            condition: '&&'
            value: current_user_role_names

      # All Phone Screeners was selected and the user is a phone screener
      all_phone_screeners:
        # role selection matches
        this:
          tag_select_contact_role:
            value: all phone screeners
            condition: '= ANY'
        # user has specific role
        user:
          role_name: phone screener

      # Med Nav was selected and the user is a user - mednav
      all_user_mednav:
        # role selection matches
        this:
          tag_select_contact_role:
            value: med nav
            condition: '= ANY'
        # user has specific role
        user:
          role_name: user - mednav

      # Navigator was selected and the user is a user - navigation
      all_user_navigation:
        # role selection matches
        this:
          tag_select_contact_role:
            value: navigator
            condition: '= ANY'
        # user has specific role
        user:
          role_name: user - navigation


      # Phone Screen Interviewer was selected and this user is it
      all_is_the_ps_interviewer:
        # role selection matches
        this:
          tag_select_contact_role:
            value: phone screen interviewer
            condition: '= ANY'
        # The initial screening was last updated by the current user
        dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
          user_id:
            user: id

  editable_if:
    # Current user created the discussion
    all_creator:
      this:
        user_id:
          user: id
  

  references:
    - activity_log__ipa_assignment_discussion:
        label: New Message
        from: this
        add: many
        prevent_disable: true
        add_with:
          extra_log_type: general_discussion
          prev_activity_type: general_discussion
        filter_by:
          extra_log_type: general_discussion
        view_as:
          edit: hide


general_discussion:
  label: Message

  <<: *discussion_message_defaults

      Do you use a CPAP machine or another device for your sleep apnea?

    placeholder_device_details_v1: |

    placeholder_device_details_v2: |
      Additional details

    bed_and_wake_time_details: |
      What is your usual bed and wake time during the week?
      
      *IF NECESSARY*, ask if participant works night shifts.

associated_reports.name: Search IPA Subject
associated_reports.description:
Search subjects by name, phone, email or ID.
Leave the search field empty to see all subjects.
associated_reports.sql:
select distinct m.id master_id, 
pi.first_name, pi.middle_name, pi.last_name, pi.nick_name,
a.street, a.street2, a.city, a.state, a.zip, 
pc.data, pc.rec_type
from masters m
inner join player_infos pi
on pi.master_id = m.id 
inner join ipa_assignments b
on m.id = b.master_id
left join addresses a
on m.id = a.master_id
left join player_contacts pc
on pc.master_id = m.id
where 
(:name is null 
or pi.first_name ~* :name
or pi.last_name ~* :name
or pi.middle_name ~* :name
or pi.nick_name ~* :name
or( 
    pi.first_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 1),'none')
    AND pi.last_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 2),'none')
  )
) OR
(
regexp_replace(pc.data, '\W+', '', 'g') ~* regexp_replace(:name, '\W+', '', 'g')
) OR
(
b.ipa_id::varchar = :name
)
associated_reports.search_attrs:
name: 
  text: 
    all: true
    multiple: single

associated_reports.name: IPA Protocol Deviation PI Review
associated_reports.description: IPA records requiring review by the PI.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.*,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN ipa_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN activity_log_ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type in ('pi_review', 'initial_review')
 AND p.select_severity = 'major'


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type = 'initial_review'
AND
  r = 1 AND dt.extra_log_type <> 'pi_review'

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: IPA Adverse Event PI Review
associated_reports.description: IPA records requiring review by the PI.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.*,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN ipa_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN activity_log_ipa_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type in ('pi_review', 'initial_review')
 AND p.select_relatedness IN ('related', 'possibly related') AND p.select_expectedness = 'unexpected'
 AND (p.select_location = 'internal' OR p.select_severity = 'serious')


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type = 'initial_review'
AND
  r = 1 AND dt.extra_log_type <> 'pi_review'

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: IPA Outstanding Activities
associated_reports.description: Search for records where one activity has been performed and another hasn't been performed after it (optional).
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT
   dt.master_id,
   ipa.ipa_id,
   --pi.first_name,
   --pi.last_name,
   dt.source,
   dt.extra_log_type activity,
   dt.communication_result,
   dt.checklist_signed,
   dt.exit_type,
   dt.created_at,
   dt.r
FROM (
  -- Generate a resultset of ranked results
  -- with most recently created items first
  -- that include only the requested previous and outstanding activities
  -- This allows us to see if an outstanding item appears more recently than
  -- a previous item

  SELECT
    di.*,
    dlo.exit_type,
    rank()
    OVER (
    PARTITION BY di.master_id
    ORDER BY di.created_at DESC
    ) AS r
  FROM
  (
    --
    -- IPA Tracker process
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      CASE WHEN
        (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up') THEN 'follow up'
      WHEN
        (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed') THEN 'completed'
      ELSE
        al.select_result
      END "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    WHERE
      :activity_performed = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
      OR :activity_performed = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR al.extra_log_type IN (:activity_performed, :activity_outstanding)

    UNION

    --
    -- IPA Tracker process for appointments
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      '1900-01-01 00:00:00'

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    -- INNER JOIN ipa_appointments apt
    -- ON al.master_id = apt.master_id

    WHERE
      :activity_performed = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'

    UNION
    --
    -- Inclusion / Exclusion process
    --
    SELECT
      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",
      inex.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_inex_checklists inex

    WHERE

    (
      (
        :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )
    )

    UNION

    --
    -- Phone Screen process
    --
    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_phone_screens ps

    WHERE
      (:activity_performed = 'phone-screen-complete' OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND :activity_outstanding  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
      AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    UNION

    --
    -- Navigation process
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'navigation' "source",
      extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      coalesce(event_date + start_time, created_at) "created_at"

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_navigations nav

    WHERE
    (
      (
        :activity_performed = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR :activity_performed = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )

      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding  = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )
    )


  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    -- Add an exit type column for those participants that have exited the study
    -- NULL if they are still in the study

    --
    -- Phone Screen not interested or not eligible
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM ipa_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    --
    -- Phone screen not interested
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    --
    -- Withdrew
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    --
    -- Exited, L2FU (before scheduling) or Completed study
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      CASE extra_log_type
      WHEN 'completed' THEN 'completed study'
      WHEN 'exit_opt_out' THEN 'opted out'
      WHEN 'exit_l2fu' THEN 'lost to follow-up (before scheduling)'
      END "exit_type"
    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments
    WHERE
      extra_log_type IN ('completed', 'exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu')

  -- End left outer join
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

-- End ranked selection
) AS dt

-- Include player details
inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
-- Match IPA ID to master_id
inner join ipa_assignments ipa on dt.master_id = ipa.master_id

WHERE
(
  -- Either:
  -- no outstanding activity has been selected, so just perform a plain query
  -- or:
  -- we want the first record from the results based
  -- on an order of most recently created appearing first (and therefore overriding older records)
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND r = 1
)
AND
(
  -- Based on the activity performed selection pick the appropriate conditions
  :activity_performed = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
  OR :activity_performed = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
  OR :activity_performed = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
  OR :activity_performed = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
  OR :activity_performed = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
  OR :activity_performed = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

  OR (
    :activity_performed = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
      checklist_signed = 'yes'
    )
  )

  OR :activity_performed NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = :activity_performed
)
AND (
  -- If no outstanding activity was selected then there are no conditions to apply
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL
  OR NOT (
    -- An outstanding activity was selected
    -- Based on the activity outstanding selection pick the appropriate conditions
    -- that the first record in the results must match in order to correctly override the previous activities
    -- If one was found, the NOT negation ensures a found record does not register as an activity outstanding
    r = 1
    AND (
      :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

      OR (
          :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete'
          AND (
            extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
            checklist_signed = 'yes'
          )
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = :activity_outstanding
    )
  )

)

AND (
  :completed_or_withdrawn IS NULL
  OR (
    :completed_or_withdrawn = 'in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NULL
    OR
    :completed_or_withdrawn = 'not_in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NOT NULL
  )
)
ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
activity_performed: 
  config_selector: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    default: general-follow-up
    selections: &selections
      general communication - follow-up: general-follow-up
      general communication - completed: general-completed
      scheduled screening: schedule_screening
      phone screen complete: phone-screen-complete
      inclusion/exclusion phone screen finalized (ready for sign-off): inex-phone-screen-finalized
      inclusion/exclusion phone screen sign-off (PI): inex-phone-screen-so-pi
      inclusion/exclusion phone screen sign-off (MedNav): inex-phone-screen-so-mednav
      inclusion/exclusion phone screen sign-off (Staff): inex-phone-screen-so-staff
      inclusion/exclusion tms ready for sign-off: inex-tms-responses
      inclusion/exclusion tms sign-off: inex-tms-so
      inclusion/exclusion baseline review: inex-baseline-complete
      payment made: payments
      scheduled screening follow-up: screening_follow_up
      performed screening follow-up: perform_screening_follow_up
      set appointment: appointment-set
      added emergency contacts: contact_info
      transportation and housing: transportation_and_housing
      navigation planned event: has-planned-event
      navigation event feedback: has-event-feedback
      consent mailing: consent_mailing
      exit (opt-out): exit_opt_out
      lost to follow-up (before scheduling): exit_l2fu
      withdraw: withdraw
      complete: completed


activity_outstanding: 
  config_selector: 
    label: Activity outstanding (optional)
    all: true
    multiple: single
    default: general-completed
    selections:
      <<: *selections

completed_or_withdrawn: 
  config_selector: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    default: in_study
    selections: 
      in study: in_study
      completed, exited or withdrawn: not_in_study

associated_reports.name: IPA Protocol Deviation Initial Review
associated_reports.description: IPA records requiring initial review by the Senior Clinical Research Coordinator.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id, a2.extra_log_type, a.created_at,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN ipa_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON

;

associated_reports.name: IPA Adverse Events
associated_reports.description:
IPA Adverse Events report for fast review of events requiring additional action or for summary reporting.

The activities are performed in this order: initial submission, initial review, PI review (if required), report to IRB (if PI review was required)

NOTE: the Last Activity Performed represents the last recorded activity for a specific adverse event. Therefore to find outstanding tasks, for example items requiring Report to IRB, it is necessary to search for the last activity that was performed, PI Review in this example.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id,
ipa.ipa_id,
coalesce(dt.created_at, dt.submitted_at) "last activity",
coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') "Last Activity Performed",
--pi.first_name,
--pi.last_name,
select_severity, select_location, select_relatedness, select_expectedness, event_occurred_when, event_discovered_when,
dt.primary_extra_log_type,
dt.primary_activity
FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id , a.id "primary_activity", a.extra_log_type "primary_extra_log_type", a.created_at "submitted_at", a2.created_at, a2.extra_log_type, p.select_severity, p.select_location, p.select_relatedness, p.select_expectedness,
   p.event_occurred_when, p.event_discovered_when,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN ipa_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_ipa_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id


 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
INNER JOIN ipa_assignments ipa ON dt.master_id = ipa.master_id
WHERE r = 1 
AND (:event_occurred_from IS NULL OR event_occurred_when >= :event_occurred_from)
AND (:event_occurred_to IS NULL OR event_occurred_when <= :event_occurred_to)
AND (:severity IS NULL OR select_severity = :severity)
AND (:location IS NULL OR select_location = :location)
AND ((:relatedness) IS NULL OR select_relatedness IN (:relatedness))
AND ((:expectedness) IS NULL OR select_expectedness = (:expectedness))
AND ((:latest_activity) IS NULL OR coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') IN (:latest_activity))

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
severity: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events_select_severity
    multiple: single
    default: serious
location: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events_select_location
    multiple: single

relatedness:

associated_reports.name: Ready for Sign Off - PI
associated_reports.description: Participants with inclusion / exclusion checklist ready for sign off by PI
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT
   dt.master_id,
   ipa.ipa_id,
   --pi.first_name,
   --pi.last_name,
   dt.source,
   dt.extra_log_type activity,
   dt.communication_result,
   dt.checklist_signed,
   dt.exit_type,
   dt.created_at,
   dt.r
FROM (

  SELECT
    di.*,
    dlo.exit_type,
    rank()
    OVER (
    PARTITION BY di.master_id
    ORDER BY di.created_at DESC
    ) AS r
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      CASE WHEN
        (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up') THEN 'follow up'
      WHEN
        (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed') THEN 'completed'
      ELSE
        al.select_result 
      END "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    WHERE
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' is not null AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' is not null AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    (
      al.extra_log_type IN ('inex-phone-screen-finalized', 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi', 'withdraw', 'perform_screening_follow_up')
    )

    UNION

    SELECT
      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",
      inex.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_inex_checklists inex
    WHERE

    (
      (
        'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
      ) 
      
      
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' IS NOT NULL AND (
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
      ) 
    ) 

    UNION

    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_phone_screens ps
    WHERE

    ('inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'phone-screen-complete' OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' IS NOT NULL AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi'  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
    AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    

  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM ipa_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'completed exit survey' "exit_type"
    FROM ipa_surveys surv
    WHERE
      select_survey_type = 'exit survey'
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join ipa_assignments ipa on dt.master_id = ipa.master_id

WHERE
('inex-phone-screen-so-pi' IS NULL OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' IS NOT NULL AND r = 1)
AND
(

  'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-follow-up' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
  OR
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-completed' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'

  OR (
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      dt.extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
      checklist_signed = 'yes'
    )
  )
  OR (
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'phone-screen-complete'
    AND (
      dt.extra_log_type IN ('phone_screen_finalized')
    )
  )
  OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND dt.extra_log_type = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized'
)
AND (
  'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' IS NULL
  OR NOT (
    r = 1
    AND (
      'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'general-follow-up' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'general-completed' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'

      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'

      OR (
          'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
          AND (
            dt.extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
            checklist_signed = 'yes'
          )
      )

      OR (
        'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' = 'phone-screen-complete'
        AND (
          dt.extra_log_type IN ('phone_screen_finalized')
        )
      )
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND dt.extra_log_type = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi'
    )
  )

)
AND (
  'in_study' IS NULL 
  OR (
    'in_study' = 'in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NULL
    OR
    'in_study' = 'not_in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NOT NULL
  )
)
ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

    SELECT

      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    WHERE
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' is not null AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' is not null AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    (
      al.extra_log_type IN ('inex-phone-screen-finalized', 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff', 'withdraw', 'perform_screening_follow_up')
    )

    UNION

    SELECT
      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",
      inex.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_inex_checklists inex
    WHERE

    (
      (
        'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      ) 
      
      
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' IS NOT NULL AND (
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      ) 
    ) 

    UNION

    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_phone_screens ps
    WHERE

    ('inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'phone-screen-complete' OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' IS NOT NULL AND 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff'  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
    AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    

  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM ipa_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'completed exit survey' "exit_type"
    FROM ipa_surveys surv
    WHERE
      select_survey_type = 'exit survey'
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join ipa_assignments ipa on dt.master_id = ipa.master_id

WHERE
('inex-phone-screen-so-staff' IS NULL OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' IS NOT NULL AND r = 1)
AND
(

  'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-follow-up' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
  OR
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'general-completed' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
  OR 
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'

  OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
  OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-tms-so' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'

  OR (
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      dt.extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
      checklist_signed = 'yes'
    )
  )
  OR (
    'inex-phone-screen-finalized' = 'phone-screen-complete'
    AND (
      dt.extra_log_type IN ('phone_screen_finalized')
    )
  )
  OR 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND dt.extra_log_type = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized'
)
AND (
  'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' IS NULL
  OR NOT (
    r = 1
    AND (
      'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'general-follow-up' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'general-completed' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'

      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR 
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'

      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-tms-so' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'

      OR (
          'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
          AND (
            dt.extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
            checklist_signed = 'yes'
          )
      )

      OR (
        'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' = 'phone-screen-complete'
        AND (
          dt.extra_log_type IN ('phone_screen_finalized')
        )
      )
      OR 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND dt.extra_log_type = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff'
    )
  )

)
AND (
  'in_study' IS NULL 
  OR (
    'in_study' = 'in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NULL
    OR
    'in_study' = 'not_in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NOT NULL
  )
)
ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: Ready for Sign Off - TMS
associated_reports.description: Participants with inclusion / exclusion TMS eligibility review ready for sign off by TMS group
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT
   dt.master_id,
   ipa.ipa_id,
   --pi.first_name,
   --pi.last_name,
   dt.source,
   dt.extra_log_type activity,
   dt.communication_result,
   dt.checklist_signed,
   dt.exit_type,
   dt.created_at,
   dt.r
FROM (

  SELECT
    di.*,
    dlo.exit_type,
    rank()
    OVER (
    PARTITION BY di.master_id
    ORDER BY di.created_at DESC
    ) AS r
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      CASE WHEN
        (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up') THEN 'follow up'
      WHEN
        (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed') THEN 'completed'
      ELSE
        al.select_result 
      END "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    WHERE
    'inex-tms-responses' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
    OR
    'inex-tms-responses' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
    OR
    'inex-tms-so' is not null AND 'inex-tms-so' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    'inex-tms-so' is not null AND 'inex-tms-so' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
    OR
    (
      al.extra_log_type IN ('inex-tms-responses', 'inex-tms-so', 'withdraw', 'perform_screening_follow_up')
    )

      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",

      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_inex_checklists inex

      (

        OR 'inex-tms-responses' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR 'inex-tms-responses' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR 'inex-tms-responses' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'

        'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      ) 
    ) 

    UNION

    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_phone_screens ps
    WHERE

    ('inex-tms-responses' = 'phone-screen-complete' OR 'inex-tms-so' IS NOT NULL AND 'inex-tms-so'  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
    AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    

  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM ipa_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    SELECT
      master_id,
      'completed exit survey' "exit_type"
    FROM ipa_surveys surv
    WHERE
      select_survey_type = 'exit survey'
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join ipa_assignments ipa on dt.master_id = ipa.master_id

WHERE

  OR 'inex-tms-responses' = 'inex-tms-so' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'

  OR (
    'inex-tms-responses' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      dt.extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND

    )
  )
  OR (

)
AND (

  OR NOT (

      'inex-tms-so' = 'general-follow-up' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR 'inex-tms-so' = 'general-completed' AND dt.extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'

      OR 
        'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR 
        'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR 
        'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR 
        'inex-tms-so' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND dt.extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'

associated_reports.name: Ready for Scheduling
associated_reports.description:
Participants that have a set appointment date.

Select to show participants where scheduling has not started (default), or show all participants with appointments
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT
   dt.master_id,
   ipa.ipa_id,
   --pi.first_name,
   --pi.last_name,
   dt.source,
   dt.extra_log_type activity,
   dt.communication_result,
   dt.checklist_signed,
   dt.exit_type,
   dt.created_at,
   dt.r
FROM (
  -- Generate a resultset of ranked results
  -- with most recently created items first
  -- that include only the requested previous and outstanding activities
  -- This allows us to see if an outstanding item appears more recently than
  -- a previous item

  SELECT
    di.*,
    dlo.exit_type,
    rank()
    OVER (
    PARTITION BY di.master_id
    ORDER BY di.created_at DESC
    ) AS r
  FROM
  (
    --
    -- IPA Tracker process
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      CASE WHEN
        (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up') THEN 'follow up'
      WHEN
        (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed') THEN 'completed'
      ELSE
        al.select_result
      END "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    WHERE
      'appointment-set' = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
      OR 'appointment-set' = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR al.extra_log_type IN ('appointment-set', :activity_outstanding)

    UNION

    --
    -- IPA Tracker process for appointments
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      '1900-01-01 00:00:00'

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignments al

    INNER JOIN ipa_appointments apt
    ON al.master_id = apt.master_id

    WHERE
      'appointment-set' = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'

    UNION
    --
    -- Inclusion / Exclusion process
    --
    SELECT
      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",
      inex.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_inex_checklists inex

    WHERE

    (
      (
        'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )
    )

    UNION

    --
    -- Phone Screen process
    --
    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_phone_screens ps

    WHERE
      ('appointment-set' = 'phone-screen-complete' OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND :activity_outstanding  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
      AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    UNION

    --
    -- Navigation process
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'navigation' "source",
      extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      coalesce(event_date + start_time, created_at) "created_at"

    FROM activity_log_ipa_assignment_navigations nav

    WHERE
    (
      (
        'appointment-set' = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR 'appointment-set' = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )

      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding  = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )
    )


  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    -- Add an exit type column for those participants that have exited the study
    -- NULL if they are still in the study

    --
    -- Phone Screen not interested or not eligible
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM ipa_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    --
    -- Phone screen not interested
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    --
    -- Withdrew
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM ipa_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    --
    -- Completed study
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'completed exit survey' "exit_type"
    FROM ipa_surveys surv
    WHERE
      select_survey_type = 'exit survey'

  -- End left outer join
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

-- End ranked selection
) AS dt

-- Include player details
inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
-- Match IPA ID to master_id
inner join ipa_assignments ipa on dt.master_id = ipa.master_id

WHERE
(
  -- Either:
  -- no outstanding activity has been selected, so just perform a plain query
  -- or:
  -- we want the first record from the results based
  -- on an order of most recently created appearing first (and therefore overriding older records)
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND r = 1
)
AND
(
  -- Based on the activity performed selection pick the appropriate conditions
  'appointment-set' = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
  OR 'appointment-set' = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

  OR (
    'appointment-set' = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
      checklist_signed = 'yes'
    )
  )

  OR 'appointment-set' NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = 'appointment-set'
)
AND (
  -- If no outstanding activity was selected then there are no conditions to apply
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL
  OR NOT (
    -- An outstanding activity was selected
    -- Based on the activity outstanding selection pick the appropriate conditions
    -- that the first record in the results must match in order to correctly override the previous activities
    -- If one was found, the NOT negation ensures a found record does not register as an activity outstanding
    r = 1
    AND (
      :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

      OR (
          :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete'
          AND (
            extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
            checklist_signed = 'yes'
          )
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = :activity_outstanding
    )
  )

)

AND (
  'in_study' IS NULL
  OR (
    'in_study' = 'in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NULL
    OR
    'in_study' = 'not_in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NOT NULL
  )
)
ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

  al.master_id,

inner join ipa_assignments ipa
